info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 22 at 1:59PM CDT until August 22 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN VERNON PARISH IN WEST CENTRAL LOUISIANA AND NORTHEASTERN NEWTON COUNTIES... At 159 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Leesville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Leesville, Anacoco, Slagle, Fort Polk, New Llano, Hornbeck, Kurthwood, Burr Ferry and Evans. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
